rows.label: qev019102_MSG0001
rows.name: Oh, hello. Did you need something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019102_MSG0002
rows.name:
...Hmm? Why yes, I did give a data probe to a
Wrothian a while ago. Her name was Go Sirho,
if I remember correctly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019102_MSG0003
rows.name:
...How's that? She broke it during installation?
Heh. How very Wrothian of her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019102_MSG0004
rows.name:
Well, no worries. Teaching other races about
FrontierNav is a top priority—I'll hand out as many
data probes as it takes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019102_MSG0005
rows.name:
However, the model I gave her was custom-built to be
simpler than the ones we normally use, and I'm afraid
I'm out of them at the moment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019102_MSG0006
rows.name:
We could make more, but it would require us to obtain
some arc sand ore. ...Or for someone to dig up some
for us, I suppose. Hint hint?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019102_MSG0007
rows.name: Er, do you mind?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019102_JNK0010
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev019102_SEL0011
rows.name: Agree to find the materials in order to help Go Sirho.

rows.label: qev019102_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev019102_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Kirsty that it's not your job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019102_MSG0008
rows.name:
It's funny to think that someone who I just taught
about data probes is now out there teaching other
races about FrontierNav.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019102_MSG0009
rows.name:
I couldn't be more proud—I knew you'd make an
excellent teacher.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019102_MSG0010
rows.name:
All right. Well, how about we call this an official
request from me, then? ...By which I mean an order.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019102_MSG0011
rows.name:
You're her teacher now, and you have a duty to see
her case through to the end.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019102_MSG0012
rows.name:
You shouldn't need more than 10 pieces of arc sand
ore. But you might have to switch some of FrontierNav's
data probes to mining probes to gather it quickly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019102_MSG0013
rows.name:
I'm tweaking the training probes to be extra tough.
They should even be angry-Wrothian-proof now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019102_MSG0014
rows.name:
I can have one built as soon as you bring me the
arc sand ore. ...How's mining for it coming along,
by the way?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019102_MSG0015
rows.name:
Nice work there, professor! I'll have a training probe
together for you in just a minute, so sit tight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019102_MSG0016
rows.name:
Here you go. I doubt she could break this one if she
tried. ...Er, but don't encourage her to try.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019102_MSG0017
rows.name:
Of course, with all the tweaks, it barely functions as a
proper data probe, but what are you going to do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019102_MSG0018
rows.name:
It's really just a learning aid, anyway. So make sure
she actually LEARNS from it, okay?[ST:wait ]
